data.subject: Going To Town (Remastered)

data.subject: Double Day (Remastered)
data.lyric:
It was a Saturday
 I came home early drunk with love
 And other things
 I must confess I love it all

data.subject: My Enemy (Remastered)
data.lyric:
I hear the whispers, baby
 If what they say is true
 They say I killed the brother
 To fall in love
